Title: Uptime Kuma Server-side Template Injection (SSTI) in Notification Templates Allows Arbitrary File Read
Description: In some Notification types (e.g., Webhook, Telegram), the `send()` function allows user-controlled renderTemplate input. This leads to a Server-side Template Injection (SSTI) vulnerability that can be exploited to read arbitrary files from the server.
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
